Uses of Interface
ca.corefacility.gview.map.event.GViewEventListener

  • Packages that use GViewEventListener 
    Package Description
    ca.corefacility.gview.layout.prototype
    Provides implementations of different "prototype" shapes.
    ca.corefacility.gview.layout.sequence
    Provides for methods to use to layout and position any items along the sequence, and dividing up the map into different slots.
    ca.corefacility.gview.layout.sequence.circular
    Provides for layout implementations specific to the circular mode.
    ca.corefacility.gview.layout.sequence.linear
    Provides layout implementations specific to the linear mode.
    ca.corefacility.gview.managers
    Provides for dynamic handling of different items on the map.
    ca.corefacility.gview.managers.labels
    Provides for classes to handle management of labels.
    ca.corefacility.gview.managers.ruler
    Provides for classes to handle management of the items for the Ruler on the GView map.
    ca.corefacility.gview.map
    Provides for implementations of the main GView map, as well as some extras (Birds eye view, etc).
    ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers
    Provides a controlled interface to the various styling objects.
    ca.corefacility.gview.map.event
    Provides for implementations of different events in GView.
    ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui
    Provides for implementations of a simple GUI for the GView map.
    ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.dialog
    Provides classes for different GView dialogs.
    ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.menu
    Provides classes different menus on the GView GUI.
    ca.corefacility.gview.map.inputHandler
    Provides for classes to handle different aspects of user input.
    ca.corefacility.gview.map.items
    Provides for implementations of specific items to be displayed on the GView map.
    ca.corefacility.gview.style
    Provides for storage/manipulation of style information for GView.
    ca.corefacility.gview.style.datastyle
    Provides for storage/manipulation of style information specific to the particular data we are displaying (such as the specific sequence/features).
    ca.corefacility.gview.style.items
    Provides for storage/manipulation of style information for particular items on the GView map.

    • Uses of GViewEventListener in ca.corefacility.gview.layout.prototype

      Subinterfaces of GViewEventListener in ca.corefacility.gview.layout.prototype 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  BackbonePinnable
      Describes something that can be "pinned" to a particular location on the backbone, so that it always stays there no matter the zoom level.
      Classes in ca.corefacility.gview.layout.prototype that implement GViewEventListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BackboneShape
      Describes a shape that is layed out along the Backbone and which can stretch/shrink on zoom levels.
      class  CompositeShape
      A Backbone shape that can be composed from two different backbone shapes, and controls switching between them at certain zoom levels.
      class  NonFragmentingStretchableShape
      A shape which can stretch itself along the backbone on receiving an event.
      class  PinnableShape
      Describes a shape that can be pinned to a location on the backbone and will stick there on zooming.
      class  StretchableShape 
      class  StrokedBackboneShape 
      Methods in ca.corefacility.gview.layout.prototype with parameters of type GViewEventListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void BackboneShape.addEventListener(GViewEventListener listener)
      Event Subject
      void BackboneShape.removeEventListener(GViewEventListener listener)

    • Uses of GViewEventListener in ca.corefacility.gview.managers

      Classes in ca.corefacility.gview.managers that implement GViewEventListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DisplayManager 
      class  FeaturesManager
      Handles layout/building up of features within the slots.
      class  LayoutManager
      Handles anything relating to layout (mainly the Backbone/SlotPath objects).
      class  LegendManager 
      class  PlotsManager 
      class  SectionManager
      Divide map up into sections, and manage/display each section individually.
      class  StyleEventManager
      Used to manage any style events, and handle swapping of style objects.
      class  ZoomEventDistributor
      This class receives zoom events from the backbone, determines if they would result in a context switch or not and distributes the appropriate events to any listeners.
